meanings.sent1: That shithead always ruins our plans.
meanings.sent2: Don't listen to that shithead, they're always causing trouble.
meanings.sent3: The party was going great until that shithead showed up.
meanings.sent4: His behavior at the meeting was that of a true shithead.
meanings.sent5: I can't stand dealing with that annoying shithead.

meanings.sent1: He's such a shithead for believing that nonsense.
meanings.sent2: She felt like a complete shithead after making that mistake.
meanings.sent3: Even a child wouldn't act as foolishly as that shithead.
meanings.sent4: His decision was as dumb as a shithead's move.
meanings.sent5: I can't believe I was so shitheadish in my approach.
